title: Food as Medicine: Food Therapy for Gastroesophageal Reflux
author: The Children's Hospital
description: This resource from Children's Hospital of Philadelphia (CHOP) discusses reflux and offers tips for a well-balanced diet that can improve symptoms.
cleaned_text: Food as Medicine: Food Therapy for Gastroesophageal Reflux Published on Published on Once reflux symptoms have resolved, try adding a wider variety of fruits, vegetables, and healthy fats to the diet. Start with small portions. You might be able to add raw foods and increase spices.
